items.title: OpenAI links up with Broadcom to produce its own AI chips

OpenAI plans to use these chips to power its future artificial intelligence models.
This move could significantly lower the cost of training and running large language models.

items.title: The number of mis-issued 1.1.1.1 certificates grows. Here’s the latest.

ai_summary: Cloudflare's 1.1.1.1 DNS service experienced a rise in mis-issued certificates.
These certificates are incorrectly issued, potentially leading to security vulnerabilities.
The issue involves certificates for domains that do not belong to the requesting party.
Cloudflare is investigating the root cause of the certificate mis-issuance problem.
Users may experience connection errors or security warnings due to the issue.
